title: Underage man is arrested on suspicion of using a McLovin fake ID
text:
An underage man was arrested on suspicion of using a fake McLovin ID from the movie Superbad in order to get into a bar.

Daniel Alfredo Burleson, 20, from Des Moines, Iowa, was approached by a police officer in an Iowa City bar on Friday evening after he was allegedly seen holding an alcoholic beverage, Iowa City Press-Citizen reported.

When the officer approached the man, he reportedly confessed to drinking a beverage with vodka mixed in but would not show his real ID.

Busted: Daniel Alfredo Burleson, pictured smiling in his mugshot, 20, from Des Moines, Iowa, was spotted by authorities in an Iowa City bar on Friday evening

Fake ID: He initially refused to show his real ID before revealing he was underage. Also in his wallet was a fake Hawaii ID with the name McLovin, which comes from the comedy Superbad

Daniel continually refused to hand over his ID to local deputies until he was removed from bar.

Allegedly when he was sifting through his wallet to show his underage ID, officers noticed the Hawaii McLovin fake in the wallet.

'When officers asked for the def's [Burleson's] fake ID the def stated the did not have one. [He] then pulled out his wallet and began shuffling through the wallet and police would see the def's fake Hawaii ID with the name "McLovin DOB 06/03/1961,"' the report stated.

The fake ID was made popular after the release of the comedy Superbad.

It follows an underage character named Fogell, played by Christopher Mintz-Plasse, who purchases a fake ID with the name 'McLovin' as the full name.

The character then proceeds to use the ID at a liquor store and surprisingly succeeds in purchasing alcohol.

Available online: Daniel confessed to purchasing the fake ID on Amazon. The ID goes for less than $7 online

Movie inspiration: Superbad follows an underage character named Fogell, played by Christopher Mintz-Plasse, who purchases a fake ID with the name 'McLovin' as the full name.

Trouble: Daniel faces charges of suspicion of possession of a fictitious license, unlawfully possessing alcohol, public intoxication and being under the legal age in a bar

Officers questioned Daniel about where he purchased the fictitious fake ID and even went as far as to query 'McLovin' in the database, which yielded zero results.

The underage man revealed he purchased the fake ID on Amazon. A fake ID similar to the one Daniel carried currently is available on the online retailer for $6.97.

According to the report, Daniel 'smelled strongly of ingested alcohol and had slurred speech and bloodshot watery eyes.'

When asked, he refused a post-arrest breathalyzer test.

Daniel was also wearing a wristband from the Airliner Bar, which was where he was discovered by authorities.

After speaking with the authorities outside, Daniel was taken into custody on charges of suspicion of possession of a fictitious license, unlawfully possessing alcohol, public intoxication, and being under the legal age in a bar.

He is set to appear in court on October 21 to address his charge of possession of a fictitious license, KCRG reports.
description: Daniel Alfredo Burleson, 20, from Des Moines, Iowa, was spotted by authorities in an Iowa City bar on Friday evening. He was carrying a McLovin fake ID (inset).
